basics.name: Fabio Brau
basics.label: Assistant Professor (RTD-A)
basics.summary: Fabio Brau is an Assistant Professor at the Depertment of Electrical and Electronic Engineering at the University of Cagliari, currently included in the SaiferLab group.     He graduated in Mathematics in 2019 at the University of Pisa with the curriculum in Numerical Analysis.

work.name: IDepartment of Electrical and Electronic Engineering, University of Cagliari
